videos.title: Oddworld x Souly - wzf / maybach (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "WZF / Maybach" by Oddworld x Souly is a visually striking and dynamic production. The video features high-energy performances and a mix of urban and futuristic aesthetics. With vibrant colors and fast-paced edits, the visual storytelling complements the rhythm and intensity of the track. The artists are showcased in various locations, including industrial backdrops and sleek, modern settings, adding to the video's edgy and stylish vibe. The direction creatively blends elements of hip-hop culture with innovative visual effects, making it a captivating watch from start to finish.
videos.additional_info:
Oddworld x Souly - wzf / maybach (2024)

The direction creatively blends elements of hip-hop culture with innovative visual effects, making it a captivating watch from start to finish.

videos.title: Sam Akpro - Death By Entertainment (2023)
videos.description: The music video for "Death By Entertainment" by Sam Akpro, directed by Pedro Takahashi, presents the artist and his band as Wall Street-style bankers caught in an endless loop of hard work and intense leisure. The video employs split screens and dynamic camera movements to convey a melancholic yet captivating atmosphere, mirroring the song's themes of repetitive daily life and the blurring lines between day and night due to physical and mental exhaustion.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: The Irrational Fear of Nothing (2016)
videos.description: Follows a paranoid, neurotic man named Terry as he wanders through the streets of Manhattan. Past memories and his irrational inner thoughts soon plague his every move. By channeling a form of mental time travel, he attempts to overcome these past anxieties.
videos.additional_info:
